name: Looking for Orange Door – Demo
description:
This is a small demo for an idea I would like to try. 

Player looks for an orange door by collect 3 STARS in the level. Player pass through the level by carefully PICKING up, and RELEASE  the blue objects at RIGHT places. After being released, blue object will act as support platform for Player to jump over the obstacles.

Controls:
- [A] / [D] : move
- [Spacebar] : jump
- [E] : pick up object
- [R] : release object

* [ESC] : Reset level whenever get stuck

P.S: This might be the first demo I have released on Itch.io. Any feedback would be great ^_^

* Soundtrack: You're no good but I love you by Soft and Furious (with Public Domain license)
